channel.title: Zanarith PK/Eco (474)
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Zanarith[/SIZE] is a pk based server, It has bossing and other various things. Skills are being added, but since this is a pk server i didn't really go too into it. But Right now quite a bit works, i'll still be adding to it.[/SIZE]
Also, My 2006 Server will be down for the next few months i have me and my development team working on it. Thanks for anyone who gave feedback and was testing for bugs, your accounts will remain!
But for now check out my Pk server :)
[SIZE=6][URL=http://"http://www.zanarith.com"]www.Zanarith.com[/URL][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Info][SIZE=4] Revision: (PI)317 Loading 474 +some higher revision items Newest Items: Chaotic/PVP Armour(vesta,statius...) Map data: 474 Duel Arena Great combat 24/7 VPS Hosted Clan Chat x3000 Xp rate NOT A SPAWN SERVER Bosses + alot more being added[/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Pictures] Login: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RPkzieX.png[/img]
Skilling Area: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UONMy7l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GHIBPqy.png[/img]
Shop Area: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p4Ja53J.png[/img]
Bossing: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vuJH1Gn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QoiEYpD.png[/img]
Custom area: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H2UIKsH.png[/img]
Thieving: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B1Caiz8.png[/img]
Full duel Arena: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aSIjfnf.png[/img]
PK Point shop: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rJe723H.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER]
